alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 2:00PM CDT until May 05 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perry County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 200 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Linden, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Centerville, Lobelville, Nunnelly, Pinewood and Bucksnort. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 149 and 158, and between mile markers 161 and 163. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
